inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addSkillBonus('CraftWeapons', 'Stackable', 10); effect.getBonuses().addSkillBonus('CraftArmor', 'Stackable', 10); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Crafter
description: You have a talent for creating useful crafts.  You gain a +10 bonus to Craft Weapons and Craft Armor.
